   Productions

I help boutique eCommerce stores turn more visitors into customers

You are running ads and get people looking at your products, but they don't buy?

You have two options:

1) Run more ads or...

2) Find a way to convert those vistors to buyers

Ask yourself, when was the last time you...

  • Attempted to go through the checkout process yourself.
  • Understood why your customers didn't buy
  • Researched how your users interacted with your store

How I can help...

For your convenience, I'm offering my best consulting services as low-risk, fixed-price packages. If you didn't find a package to meet your needs, drop me a line at josiah@kickinbahkproductions.com to discuss a custom engagement.

60-Minute Strategy Call

Want to make sure you’re heading in the right direction before you start testing? Need a quick teardown of your store's pain points? Can’t figure out where to start? I’m here to help with this laser-focused strategy call.

This 60-minute call currently costs $299. Email me for package breakdown

Custom UI Audit

In this UI audit, I’ll take a fresh professional look at your web app, determine critical design flaws, and put together an actionable plan for improving your UI/UX. You’ll get a fancy (and incredibly useful) PDF report with a detailed screen-by-screen teardown of your web app.

Audit packages start at $999. Email me for specific details

Monthly Creative Direction for Teams

Does your software company need ongoing UI/UX guidance, decision-making support, and team coaching? Are you investing much, but still struggling to achieve a good level of design? This monthly service allows you to receive top-notch guidance without hiring a creative director in-house.

Packages start at $8,000/month (depending on the team size). Email me for details
